name: Rats Love Pizza
description:
Hire people with brooms, staplers and other "weapons" to stop hordes of hungry rats. Some rats live under a pub, are drunk and run chaotically, some ran away from a laboratory and can teleport through obstacles. 

You can place your towers anywhere and change the paths of rats. There are countless ways to play this tower defense in full 3D.

Make it to the level 45 to face the final endless wave of critters and compete with friends or the whole world on a leader board.
